hesml.benchmarks.impl

Class BenchmarkSynsetsInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • hesml.benchmarks.impl.AbstractBenchmark
      • hesml.benchmarks.impl.WordNetSimBenchmark
        • hesml.benchmarks.impl.BenchmarkSynsetsInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimilarityBenchmark

    class BenchmarkSynsetsInfo
extends WordNetSimBenchmark
    The aim of this class is to generate the Synset pair info files included in our WNSimRep dataset. Each row of these files contains a set of synset pair-based attributes as follows: (1) shortest path length, (2) lowest common subsumer (LCS) using the basic depth definition, (3) lowest common subsumer for the longest depth.
    Author:
    Juan Lastra-DÃ­az

      • m_SaveICfeatures

        private boolean m_SaveICfeatures
        This flag indicates whether the IC-based features should be saved into the output file. It is only used with the IC-based similarity measures.
